Reviews.Title: Looks cheaper than other Kodak EasyShare units...
Reviews.Author: Nyxdia
Reviews.Content: This camera is offered at a great price on Amazon, really hard to beat. However, I've owned other EasyShare units and this one feels cheaper than most of them. It's kind of too light, almost as if it was made of low quality plastic. Also, you cannot store *any* pictures until you insert a memory card - other models will allow you to store at least a few pics. But most of all, what bothered me is that this model doesn't allow it to be used with a wall outlet charging device - batteries are the only option. So, you'll end up spending more money purchasing batteries in the long run.

Reviews.Title: Easy camera
Reviews.Author: Terry DiBenedetto
Reviews.Content: Good for children ....my grandchildren love this camera and it is very easy to use ..I would recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly P. Webb
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my teenage daughter.  She loves it.  It is simple and easy to use.  I would defintely buy one again!

Reviews.Title: good camara
Reviews.Author: M. Guerra
Reviews.Content: easy to use, affordable, I bought it for my 11 years old brother and hi loves it, I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for kids and adults alike
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera recently and were pleasantly surprised with the ease of use. Comes with Kodak photo CD and a USB, making sharing pictures a jiffy. 12 MP are more than enough for crystal clear pictures. Saving pics on computer or uploading to social media sites also easy using the USB cable. Overall, very pleased with the camera and the price. Totally worth it.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Geofrey Nyombi
Reviews.Content: Its old than I thought, So I would recommend in the future Try to be more clear as we buy things as per your guidance

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare CD24 12MP Digital Camera - Blue
